info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: I never told my family we were adopting a baby.
sentense.ko: 우리 가족들한테 입양 얘기 안 했어

sentense.en: who wants a big, emotional scene like that?
I invited them over for dinner tonight.
This would have gone on forever.
I’m calling them right now and canceling.
You’re telling your family you adopted a baby, tonight.
sentense.ko: 오늘 가족들한테 입양 이야기를 하는 거야

sentense.en: And you do have avoidance issues.
